CustomField.description: Each contact is individually evaluated against the rule criteria. If any one contact meets the criteria, all contacts within the account are given access. For use with Experience Clouds only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set “True” to extend visibility from one contact who meets the rule criteria to all contacts within the account. When a contact meets criteria, all contacts in the account gain access.
CustomField.label: Extend Visibility to Account
